rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Brazilian chicken exports in 2023 will end at a record of up to 5.15 million tons, ABPA said, estimating the value of exports at between $9.5 billion and $10 billion this year.

rationale: 'record' modifies 'exports' (a neutral/positive noun in this context), not a harm noun.
